name: ai-chat-app
description: AI Chat Application vá»›i A2A Protocol Support

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m src.server.app
scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web && npm run build:desktop
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:build && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules web/node_modules desktop/node_modules shared/node_modules backend/venv
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf web/dist desktop/dist desktop/build shared/dist backend/dist
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf .vite web/.vite desktop/.vite .eslintcache **/*.tsbuildinfo backend/__pycache__ backend/**/__pycache__ backend/.pytest_cache
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:logs
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:deps && npm run setup
